00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using Utilities.DataTypes;
00026 #endregion

00028 namespace Utilities.Math
00029 {
00034     public class Set<T> : Vector<T>
00035     {
00036         #region Constructors
00037 
00038         public Set()
00039             : base()
00040         {
00041 
00042         }
00043 
00044         public Set(int InitialSize)
00045             : base(InitialSize)
00046         {
00047         }
00048 
00049         #endregion
00050 
00051         #region Public Functions
00052 
00058         public bool Contains(Set<T> Set)
00059         {
00060             return Set.IsSubset(this);
00061         }
00062 
00068         public bool IsSubset(Set<T> Set)
00069         {
00070             if (Set == null || this.NumberItems > Set.NumberItems)
00071                 return false;
00072 
00073             for (int x = 0; x < this.NumberItems; ++x)
00074             {
00075                 if (!Set.Contains(this.Items[x]))
00076                     return false;
00077             }
00078             return true;
00079         }
00080 
00086         public bool Intersect(Set<T> Set)
00087         {
00088             if (Set == null)
00089                 return false;
00090             for (int x = 0; x < this.NumberItems; ++x)
00091             {
00092                 if (Set.Contains(this.Items[x]))
00093                     return true;
00094             }
00095             return false;
00096         }
00097 
00098         #endregion
00099 
00100         #region Public Static Functions
00101 
00108         public static Set<T> GetIntersection(Set<T> Set1, Set<T> Set2)
00109         {
00110             if (Set1 == null || Set2 == null || !Set1.Intersect(Set2))
00111                 return null;
00112             Set<T> ReturnValue = new Set<T>();
00113             for (int x = 0; x < Set1.NumberItems; ++x)
00114             {
00115                 if (Set2.Contains(Set1.Items[x]))
00116                     ReturnValue.Add(Set1.Items[x]);
00117             }
00118 
00119             for (int x = 0; x < Set2.NumberItems; ++x)
00120             {
00121                 if (Set1.Contains(Set2.Items[x]))
00122                     ReturnValue.Add(Set2.Items[x]);
00123             }
00124 
00125             return ReturnValue;
00126         }
00127 
00134         public static Set<T> operator +(Set<T> Set1, Set<T> Set2)
00135         {
00136             if (Set1 == null || Set2 == null)
00137                 throw new ArgumentNullException();
00138 
00139             Set<T> ReturnValue = new Set<T>();
00140             for (int x = 0; x < Set1.NumberItems; ++x)
00141             {
00142                 ReturnValue.Add(Set1.Items[x]);;
00143             }
00144             for (int x = 0; x < Set2.NumberItems; ++x)
00145             {
00146                 ReturnValue.Add(Set2.Items[x]); ;
00147             }
00148             return ReturnValue;
00149         }
00150 
00157         public static Set<T> operator -(Set<T> Set1, Set<T> Set2)
00158         {
00159             if (Set1 == null || Set2 == null)
00160                 throw new ArgumentNullException();
00161 
00162             Set<T> ReturnValue = new Set<T>();
00163             for (int x = 0; x < Set1.NumberItems; ++x)
00164             {
00165                 if (!Set2.Contains(Set1.Items[x]))
00166                     ReturnValue.Add(Set1.Items[x]);
00167             }
00168             return ReturnValue;
00169         }
00170 
00171         #endregion
00172 
00173         #region Public Overridden Functions
00174 
00175         public override string ToString()
00176         {
00177             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00178             Builder.Append("{ ");
00179             string Splitter = "";
00180             for (int x = 0; x < this.NumberItems; ++x)
00181             {
00182                 Builder.Append(Splitter);
00183                 Builder.AppendFormat(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, "{0}", this.Items[x]);
00184                 Splitter = ",  ";
00185             }
00186             Builder.Append(" }");
00187             return Builder.ToString();
00188         }

00190         #endregion
00191     }
